notes: Only reacts on hero attacks, including illusions and clones, excluding creep-heroes.
The area effect hits all enemies within range, not only heroes.
Hair Trigger first applies the debuff, then the damage.
Hair Trigger's blind uses pseudo-random distribution.
abilities.description: The next time you get attacked by a hero within 400 range, explode dealing 250 damage to all enemies within a 400 radius and causing them to miss 100% of their attacks for 2 seconds.

name: Blast Rig
description: One of a set of custom rigs once worn by infamous road agents in the Outlands, its siblings have been lost to misfires and the various tides of time.
trivia: This item's internal name is "Black Powder Bag".
